articles.title: The Simpler Life review – you have to laugh at this reality show’s nonsense concept - The Guardian
articles.description: Supposedly, Channel 4’s new reality show – which ships city slickers out to an Amish farm without mains electricity, gas or convenience food – is a social experiment. Sure it is…
